product_name: Brooks L. S. D. Lite Jacket III - Women's
long_description: The women's Brooks L.S.D. Lite III jacket offers lightweight protection when the weather is unpredictable. Extremely lightweight microfiber polyester fabric is highly breathable, blocks wind, and resists light precipitation thanks to a Durable Water Repellent finish. Dual rear vents increase breathability. Jacket packs into its own zippered pocket. Hood cinches from front to back to create a close, comfortable fit. Reflective detailing increases your visibility to motorists in low light. Weighs a mere 4.3 oz. (size Medium). The semifitted women's L.S.D. Lite III jacket is not too tight and not too loose.
short_description: The women's Brooks L.S.D. Lite III jacket offers lightweight protection when the weather is unpredictable.
